Posts.Content: hi all i lost my grandmother this may from cancer. she was diangosed only 10 days before she succumbed to it. i think breast cancer is such a relevant topic for women. actually today im going to be watching sheryl crow on oprah talk about her own battle with breast cancer and i thought it could be fun for other oprah fans or interested people to chat live on www.babbledog.com/invite/022140
Posts.Title: breast cancer talked about today on oprah 8/15
